Headline: #157 Streeterville/Taylor Temporary Westbound Reroute near Pearson/De Witt Place
ShortDescription: WB 157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temp. rerouted via Miles Van Der Rohe, Deleware, Inner Lake Shore Dr, Chicago and Fairbanks: near .Pearson/De Witt Place

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #157 Streeterville/Taylor buses are temporarily rerouted via Miles Van Der Rohe, Deleware, Inner Lake Shore Dr, Chicago and Fairbanks including the normal route streets at the beginning and end, due to street  blockage near  Pearson/De Witt Place. 

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
